Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal document on recto (17 ll.) and verso (list of 16 witnesses); also 1 l. of Greek docket on recto. Dated Tybi 10 of year 46 of Ptolemy VIII Euergetes II - receipt of sixth of patrimony by younger brother. Receipt of a share in a division of inherited property given by Khapokhrates son of Horos to his elder brother Osoroeris; scribe Esminis son of Phabis. A paper copy of this papyrus is P BM EA 10397. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "(The parties belong to a family well known through a series of demotic papyri in Berlin)."
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p.60-62, pl.47, 49)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (8070) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/8070)
